about_the_game:
Want to build a bunny paradise? Embark on a bunny-filled journey in Usagi Shima, where you transform an abandoned island into a cozy haven for adorable bunnies! Usagi Shima is a relaxing, bunny-collecting idle game.


Turn your island into a whimsical bunny paradise with toys, plants, and charming building decorations. Relax and enjoy the calm and cozy island atmosphere, synced to your time〜




Entice fluffy tourists, deck your island with cuteness, and befriend lovable bunnies. Dress them in delightful hats and earn a special gift as you become the best of bunny buddies!




Under the right conditions, meet rare and special bunnies that pay a visit to your island. See if you can meet and collect them all!




Capture adorable memories with your bunny buddies using the photo feature. Create a scrapbook filled with heartwarming moments and save them to your device as wallpaper!


Show some love to your bunnies! Feed them, brush their fluffy fur, and engage in playful activities. Watch your bunny companions thrive as you shower them with care. Immerse yourself in a soothing atmosphere while enjoying precious moments with your bunny pals.


Craft a bunny retreat like no other by building cute shops and crafting beautiful landscape features. Design an enchanting escape that adds to the charm of your bunny-filled island.

Get ready to unwind and create a delightful bunny sanctuary in Usagi Shima!




  • Discover and collect 30+ rabbits with unique looks and features!
  • Collect 100+ items to decorate with, some even interactive!
  • Pet, feed, brush, and play hide and seek with the bunnies to build friendship
  • Dress up your bunnies with adorable hats!
  • Receive keepsakes from bunnies you’ve become best friends with, and even invite them to stay on your island.
  • Take snapshots to build an adorable photo album and even make the captured photos into device wallpapers
  • Hand-drawn and traditionally animated art style
  • Synced with real-time, experience the island ambience that matches your time of day
  • Cozy idle gameplay with no time limits, no stress, peaceful and soothing to play at your own pace!

Play Usagi Shima...

If you have a soft spot for bunnies, dream of having a bunny companion, or proudly identify as a bunny parent, Usagi Shima is the perfect tranquil game for you! Dive into a serene world adorned with adorable bunnies, offering a soothing and enjoyable experience.

If you have a passion for decorating, interior design, tycoon games, clicker games, and simulators, or prefer relaxing casual games like Animal Crossing, Stardew Valley, Cats & Soup, Neko Atsume, and other pocket camp games.

If you seek relaxation, meditation, and ways to alleviate anxiety and depression while indulging in cute games with charming art, Usagi Shima is your ideal destination.

Take a whimsical trip to Usagi Shima, where the bunny paradise awaits to bring you joy!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6400 CPU @ 2.70GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Mojave (10.14)
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Sonoma (14)
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

name: Usagi Shima: Bunny Island

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Want to build a bunny paradise? Embark on a bunny-filled journey in Usagi Shima, where you transform an abandoned island into a cozy haven for adorable bunnies! Entice fluffy tourists, deck your island with cuteness, and befriend lovable bunnies.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Indonesian, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
